item.pipe_connector.jei.description:
The Pipe Connector allows you to choose two positions by Shift+Right-Clicking, once both positions are chosen, a preview of the path will be shown.
 You can change the depth of the pipe by Shift+Scrolling.
 Once you are happy with the path, you can Shift+Right-Click to open the GUI and click on 'Place Pipes' to place the pipes.
 'Reset Positions' to reset the positions if you are unhappy with the first position.
 A list of supported pipes that can be placed can be found in JEI.
